plugins.name: Cloudflare DNS
plugins.description: ACME DNS-01 challenge provider for wildcard certificates without exposing ports 80/443. Perfect for internal services and multi-domain setups.

plugins.name: Redis Storage
plugins.description: Store certificates and cluster state in Redis for true multi-instance deployments. Essential for Kubernetes and high-availability setups.

plugins.name: PostgreSQL Storage
plugins.description: PostgreSQL-backed certificate storage for centralized management and compliance requirements. Integrates with existing database infrastructure.

plugins.name: Cloudflare KV
plugins.description: Leverage Cloudflare Workers KV for globally distributed edge certificate storage with ultra-low latency access.

plugins.name: Brotli Compression
plugins.description: Modern Brotli compression providing 15-25% better compression than gzip for faster page loads and reduced bandwidth costs.

plugins.name: Rate Limit
plugins.description: Enable rate limiting for HTTP requests to prevent abuse and manage traffic spikes.
